item.title: CVE-2023-51396|2023-12-29T10:27:12.202Z -- brizy.io -- brizy%20%E2%80%93%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brizy.Io Brizy – Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Brizy – Page Builder: from n/a through 2.4.29.
